item.title: WSL 2 tips
item.description: WSL 2 Features Install WSL 2 Accessing Files between WSL and Windows Host From WSL - Windows hosts volumns are mounted at /mnt, e.g. /mnt/c for driver C:. From Windows host - WSL distro file system is mount as \\wsl$\{distro}, where {distro} is the WSL distro name, e.g. unbuntu or debian WSL GUI WSL2 supports its own X server since Win10.19044 and Win11. Simply set DISPLAY=:0 and all X applications can use the native X server.
